title: Italic Serif Font
content:
Can anybody identify this font please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MotherDesign_Holiday12Days01_5790.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MotherDesign_Holiday12Days11_6585.jpg)

Font: 

 Adobe Caslon (Swash Italic) 

Solved By: 

 [Renko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204425/http:/typophile.com/user/12000 "View user profile.")

| --- | --- |
| [MotherDesign\_Holiday12Days01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204425/http:/typophile.com/files/MotherDesign_Holiday12Days01.jpg) | 19.03 KB |
author: LyamB

comments.content:
For something similar, with more swashiness, check out the brand-new [Auberge Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204425/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/auberge-script/) from Sudtipos.

- Lex
